review: Works great with Netflix, SlingTV, and Pandora. Very easy to use.  Just plugged it in and started watching.  Could not be happier.
author: Eugene K Getz

review: The main reason I bought this was to stream MLB.tv games.  Installation and setup was a breeze.  The menus were a little crowded for my tastes, but it was pretty easy to navigate around, even with the super-basic remote (no QWERTY keyboard?).  Tried streaming a few things on Prime, and they looked great.  And then came MLB.tv.  *Sigh*.  Buffering and buffering and buffering all day long, between every pitch.  Every... pitch!  I will be returning this for either Chromecast or Roku or Apple device.  Sorry little Fire Stick, but you don't hold a candle to the competition.
author: C. Roessler

review: Great product I'm very happy with my purchase.

review: Super easy set up.  Was watching shows in a couple minutes.  Packaging was simple to unwrap.  Bought an extra one for my other TV.

review: It's now so easy for me to control and watch many channels via this little device. Response very quickly to button click. The only bad thing I can think of for this is there are not many apps or games available. There are more apps for Fire TV but not this stick.
author: Shang Tseng

review: I bought this for a guest room and I love the convenience of it!  I wouldn't use it over satellite for one of the main TV's in my house, but it's perfect for a guest room that doesn't get used that often.  As a Prime member, I'm easily able to watch Prime content and listen to Prime music, but then I'm also able to log-in to my Netflix account too.  And when there's no one in the guest room, I can just unplug it from the guest TV and plug it into my main TV -- making it easier to watch my Prime content all the time!
author: A. Gant

review: I was really excited about this product, however I am disappointed with the connectivity.  My fire stick takes 5 attempts to connect to the wireless network even through it is next to the hub and the menu states that the network connection is very.  Once it is connected, I ALWAYS get a message saying that the connection is slow.  Then it will work perfectly until the next time that I use the fire TV stick.  I even contacted customer service and the problem still exists.  If this was fixed, it would be a 5 star product.
